00020 
00021 #include "BaseWorldUtility.h"
00022 #include "FindModule.h"
00023 #include "BaseConnectionManager.h"
00024 
00025 Define_Module(BaseWorldUtility);
00026 
00027 
00028 const double BaseWorldUtility::speedOfLight = 299792458.0; 
00029 
00030 BaseWorldUtility::BaseWorldUtility()
00031   : cSimpleModule()
00032   , playgroundSize()
00033   , useTorusFlag(false)
00034   , use2DFlag(false)
00035   , airFrameId(0)
00036   , isInitialized(false)
00037 {}
00038 
00039 void BaseWorldUtility::initialize(int stage) {
00040   if (stage == 0) {
00041         initializeIfNecessary();
00042   }
00043   else if(stage == 1) {
00044     //check if necessary modules are there
00045     //Connection Manager
00046     if(!FindModule<BaseConnectionManager*>::findGlobalModule()) {
00047       opp_warning("Could not find a connection manager module in the network!");
00048     }
00049   }
00050 }
00051 
00052 void BaseWorldUtility::initializeIfNecessary()
00053 {
00054   if(isInitialized)
00055     return;
00056 
00057   use2DFlag      = par("use2D");
00058   playgroundSize = Coord(par("playgroundSizeX").doubleValue(),
00059                                par("playgroundSizeY").doubleValue(),
00060                                use2DFlag ? 0. : par("playgroundSizeZ").doubleValue());
00061 
00062   if(playgroundSize.x < 0) {
00063     opp_error("Playground size in X direction is invalid: "\
00064           "(%f). Should be greater than or equal to zero.", playgroundSize.x);
00065   }
00066   if(playgroundSize.y < 0) {
00067     opp_error("Playground size in Y direction is invalid: "\
00068           "(%f). Should be greater than or equal to zero.", playgroundSize.y);
00069   }
00070   if(!use2DFlag && playgroundSize.z < 0) {
00071     opp_error("Playground size in Z direction is invalid: "\
00072           "(%f). Should be greater than or equal to zero.", playgroundSize.z);
00073   }
00074 
00075   useTorusFlag = par("useTorus");
00076 
00077   airFrameId = 0;
00078 
00079   isInitialized = true;
00080 }
00081 
00082 Coord BaseWorldUtility::getRandomPosition()
00083 {
00084   initializeIfNecessary();
00085 
00086         return Coord(uniform(0, playgroundSize.x),
00087                      uniform(0, playgroundSize.y),
00088                      use2DFlag ? 0. : uniform(0, playgroundSize.z));
00089 }
